game.name: Faust Duel
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: FAUST DUEL is a Blackjack-driven roguelike deck-builder. Play as Dr. Faust, who lost his wager and now joins Hell’s games. Within a limited number of rounds, earn enough chips to buy back your soul from its master.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FAUST DUEL is a Blackjack-driven roguelike deck-builder. Play as Dr. Faust, who lost his wager and now joins Hell’s games. Within a limited number of rounds, earn enough chips to buy back your soul from its master.
